name: Radioactive Memories
description:
Lovy & Pawa are two aliens lost in GP-820 planet. They are connected by a thread that does not allow them to separate. However, this thread is impregnated with radioactivity that affects them two when they are close. But when they turn away, they risk being forgotten from each other.

That is why Lovy & Pawa must collect potions to eliminate the radioactivity and maintain their health. They must collect some old memories together too to avoid being forgotten in the middle of the distance. All this because they want to be together again.

Platform: PC standalone 
Genre: Puzzle
Rating: Teen
Date of publication: Aug 31, 2020
Target audience: People of 13 - 18

Team: Girls Pawa

Ana María Castro Gómez: Programmer 
Michelle Bohórquez Vásquez: Programmer
Jessi Gizeh Velandia Carvajal: 3D and 2D Artist
Jeimy Natalia Medina Otero: 3D and 2D Artist
Itzel González Estrada: Sound Desinger
